channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 09-Feb-16
item.description:
"That statement is either so deep it would take a lifetime to fully comprehend every particle of its meaning, or it is a load of absolute tosh. Which is it, I wonder?"

- Terry Pratchett, Hogfather

item.title: 08-Feb-16
item.description:
"I thought it was going to be bucket-of-water time myself."

Gaspode's way of saying "I'm sorry, was I intruding?" - Terry Pratchett, Moving Pictures

item.title: 07-Feb-16
item.description:
"The shortest unit of time in the multiverse is the New York Second, defined as the period of time between the traffic lights turning green and the cab behind you honking."

- Terry Pratchett, Lords and Ladies

item.title: 06-Feb-16
item.description:
"Just because someone's a member of an ethnic minority doesn't mean they're not a nasty small-minded little jerk [...]"

- Terry Pratchett, Feet of Clay

item.title: 05-Feb-16
item.description:
"I wants your body, Mrs Ogg."

Casanunda makes his move - Terry Pratchett, Lords and Ladies
